item.title: CIS-Script
item.description: This CIS Script is build to report and remediate based on the your organisation score. While working with CIS Benchmarks (Remediation Scripts and/or Configuration Profiles) I felt this could be done better, faster and easier. The guys from the macOS Security Compliance Project did an amazing job automating the guidance and configuration profiles.

item.title: onAirScanner
item.description: While working from home, we all have a lot of meetings, and sometimes a family member or a roommate has no idea that you are in a meeting and they walk into the room without even a knock. Setting up a light to show when you are "ON AIR" or in a meeting is a great solution.
